sentences: Erik van der Wurff (9 July 1945 â€“ 22 September 2014) was a Dutch pianist, composer, arranger, producer and conductor.
He also made acting appearances in two Dutch-German television shows in 1977 and 1980.
Van der Wurff was born in De Bilt, Utrecht.
In 2009, he was given the Order of the Netherlands Lion.
Van der Wurff died from leukemia on 22 September 2014 in Soest, Netherlands, aged 69.
